### subroutines

def xy2id(ai, bi)
  (ai * (ai + 1) / 2) + bi
end

def print_pl(n, pl)
  for ai in (0...n)
    id0 = xy2id(ai, 0)
    id1 = id0 + ai
    p pl[id0..id1]
  end
end

### main

n, m = gets.strip.split(' ').map{|s| s.to_i}

nn = n * (n + 1) / 2
pl = nn.times.map{0}

m.times do
  ai, bi, xi = gets.strip.split(' ').map{|s| s.to_i}
  pl[xy2id(ai - 1, bi - 1)] = xi + 1
  #p [ai, bi, xi]
end
#print_pl(n, pl)

count = 0

for ai in (0...n)
  nxta = (ai < (n - 1))
  for bi in (0..ai)
    id  = xy2id(ai, bi)
    plid = pl[id]
    if plid > 0
      count += 1
      if plid > 1 && nxta
        plid -= 1
        id0 = xy2id(ai + 1, bi)
        pl[id0] = plid if pl[id0] < plid
        id1 = id0 + 1
        pl[id1] = plid if pl[id1] < plid
      end
    end
  end
end
#print_pl(n, pl)

puts count

$kugi=array();
fscanf(STDIN,"%d %d",$n,$m);
for($i=0;$i<$m;$i++)
  {
    fscanf(STDIN,"%d %d %d",$a,$b,$x);
    for($j=$a;$j<=$a+$x;$j++)
      for($k=$b;$k<=$b+($j-$a);$k++)
	$kugi[$j][$k]=1;
  }
$sum=0;
foreach($kugi as $val)
$sum+=array_sum($val);
fprintf(STDOUT,"%d\n",$sum);
?>

N,M = map(int,input().split())
d = [ [0]*(N+2) for _ in range(N+2) ]

for i in range(M):
  a,b,x = map(int,input().split())
  a -= 1
  b -= 1
  d[a][b] += 1
  d[a][b+1] -= 1
  d[a+x+1][b] -= 1
  d[a+x+2][b+1] += 1
  d[a+x+1][b+x+2] += 1
  d[a+x+2][b+x+2] -= 1

# for r in d: print(r)

# vertical
for i in range(N+2):
  for j in range(1, N+2):
    d[i][j] += d[i][j-1]

# print("=============vertical===============")
# for r in d: print(r)

# horizontal
for i in range(N+2):
  for j in range(1, N+2):
    d[j][i] += d[j-1][i]

# print("=============horizontal===============")
# for r in d: print(r)

# diagonal
for i in range(1, N+2):
  for j in range(1, N+2):
    d[i][j] += d[i-1][j-1]

# print("=============diagonal===============")
# for r in d: print(r)

res = 0
for i in range(N+2):
  for j in range(N+2):
    if d[i][j] != 0:
      res += 1

print(res)
